## Overview

## Simulations

Set the parameter 'lambda'

```{r }
set.seed(1)
lambda = 0.2
hist(rexp(40, lambda))
```

## Sample Mean versus Theoretical Mean

```{r }
mns = NULL
for (i in 1 : 1000) mns = c(mns, mean(rexp(40, lambda)))
hist(mns)
```

## Sample Variance versus Theoretical Variance

```{r }
mns = NULL
for (i in 1 : 1000) mns = c(mns, var(rexp(40, lambda)))
hist(mns)
```
